mapper.select: SELECT /* etEntrDlvpInfo.getEtEntrDlvpInfoList */ ENTR_DLVP_NO , ENTR_NO , DLVP_TYP_CD , DLVP_NM , USE_YN , ZIP_NO_SEQ , ZIP_NO , ZIP_ADDR , DTL_ADDR , UTAKMN_NM , AEMP_TEL_RGN_NO , AEMP_TEL_TXNO_NO , AEMP_TEL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_RGN_NO,'') || COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_RGN_NO,'') || COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(AEMP_TEL_END_NO, '') END AS AEMP_TEL_NO , AEMP_CELL_SCT_NO , AEMP_CELL_TXNO_NO , AEMP_CELL_END_NO , CASE COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_SCT_NO,'') || COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_END_NO, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_SCT_NO,'') || COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_TXNO_NO, '') || COALESCE(AEMP_CELL_END_NO, '') END AS AEMP_CELL_NO , SYS_REG_ID , SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , SYS_MOD_DTM FROM ET_ENTR_DLVP_INFO WHERE ENTR_NO = #{entrNo}
